author: smartprogrammer
content:
Hey guys,
Question to CL devs. What size of message on gossipsub counts as negligible and what size of the message counts as heavy for the beacon chain?
As part of a research nethermind is doing. we want to utilize the gossipsub protocol to relay some messages without having a great affect on the network. this is the reason for the question.
